Let AAA be the ring C⟨u,v⟩/⟨uv−vu−1⟩\C\gen{u, v}/\gen{uv - vu - 1}C⟨u,v⟩/⟨uv−vu−1⟩, the quotient of the free associative algebra on two generators by the two-sided ideal.

  1. Show that every nonzero AAA-module MMM has infinite dimension as a complex vector space.
  2. Let MMM be an AAA-module with a nonzero element yyy such that uy=0uy = 0uy=0. Show that the elements y,vy,v2y,…y, vy, v^2y, \ldotsy,vy,v2y,… are C\CC-linearly independent in MMM.
